title: The Works of Robert Louis Stevenson - Swanston Edition, Vol. 25
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: There came one day to lunch at thehouse two very formidable old ladies--or one very formidable, and theother what you please--answering to the honoured and historic name ofthe Miss C---- A----'s of Balnamoon.

title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: One of the chief leaders in Crawford's army was JohnCollasse of Bonnymoon (or Balnamoon), who commanded a gallant body of men, armed with bills andbattle-axes, on which the Earl greatly relied.
